content: The team will build a voice meter app focusing solely on volume measurement and noise cancellation.
Max will start working on the Flask prototype for the baseline feature set of volume measurement and noise cancellation.
The project will focus on building a voice meter app that measures volume levels and includes noise cancellation.
No inclusion of emotional tone indicators in the initial version of the app.
Max is assigned to work on the Flask prototype for the baseline feature set focusing on volume measurement and noise cancellation.
